alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Campbell; Claiborne; Knox; Morgan; Scott; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 1:51PM CDT until August 12 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Morgan County in east Tennessee... West central Claiborne County in east Tennessee... North central Knox County in east Tennessee... Anderson County in east Tennessee... Campbell County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Scott County in east Tennessee... Western Union County in east Tennessee... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 250 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Huntsville to 6 miles southwest of Jacksboro to 7 miles northwest of Oliver Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, La Follette, Jacksboro, Caryville, Rocky Top, Norris, Norris Dam State Park, Elk Valley, Smokey Junction, and Andersonville. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 116 and 151. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Campbell; Claiborne; Knox; Morgan; Scott; Union
